name: Construct Dash
description:
A 2.5D Platformer game inspired by Mario and all the likes.

==========================================================================

Stuck in a maze like construction zone,  you find yourself lost and confused. Find your way out through  a very limited two stage prototype game.

==========================================================================

This is a prototype assignment for GameDevHQ 2.5D  platformer course. 

Game Version 1.0  ---- Prototype
Game Version 1.1 ---- Current "Fixed The rolling glitch"

Feedbacks are greatly welcomed!

Created by Simon Truong.
